Sam: 2 - 20
MikeSr.: 21 - 40
MikeJr.: 41 - 60
CHarlie: 61 - 79

Remember:
	Work in dataset copies
	Include the ID column
	Don't drop rows or columns
	Save your subset of data to the clean_data folder
	Keep notes on column name changes, or anything interesting
	Do impute missing values
	Comment your code.

	don't_be_a_dickhead = True
